alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:31AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT INDIANA AND SOUTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM EDT... At 631 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Ford City, or 9 miles southeast of Kittanning, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Indiana, Clymer, Rural Valley, West Lebanon, Chevy Chase Heights, Ernest, Marion Center, Cherry Tree, Elderton, Creekside, Plumville, and Glen Campbell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
